paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

functional_data.summary: A neutral leaky variant that does not cause any increase in cancer risk.
assays: mouse embryonic stem cell (mESC) complementation assay

variants.segregation_data: not pathogenic given that mESCs are fully viable and resistant to DNA-damaging agents in those conditions.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was shown to reduce FL BRCA2 transcripts to ~60% without increasing cancer risk.
key_quotes: Analysis of a neutral leaky variant (c.231T>G) showed that a reduction to ~60% of FL BRCA2 transcripts from a mutant allele does not cause any increase in cancer risk.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
